articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: EU hits Russian oil, shadow fleet with new sanctions over Ukraine war - Al Jazeera
articles.description: European Union says move amounts to one of the strongest sanctions packages against Russia to date linked to the war.
articles.content: The European Union has approved a new raft of stiff sanctions against Russia over its war in Ukraine, including a lower oil price cap, a ban on transactions with Nord Stream gas pipelines, and the ta… [+3944 chars]
